column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////First time here and have heard great reviews.. Ordered our food to go.  We ordered the Tonkotsu Assari
column2: Tonkotsu spicy and the cha cha cha.  The broth and noodles boxed separately which was great so our noodles wouldn't get soggy.  Ordered extra sides- the spicy bean sprouts and the nori dried seaweed.  I liked how the labeled which broth was which.  The Tonoktsu spicy and the cha cha cha was delicious.  My son wasn't a fan of the Assari. Overall loved everything and looking forward to dining in and trying some different dishes!!
